data.oncology_innovation_benefit: Up to R24,000 per cycle for drugs or treatments not yet registered on CAMS or not yet on SA Oncology Consortium formulary
data.extended_oncology_benefit: Up to R24,000 for a defined list of cancer and treatments that are not subject to PMB clinical entry criteria
data.medicine_coverage: All cancer-related medicine from a designated service provider at 100% of Discovery Health Rate
data.programme_access: Comprehensive cover if diagnosed with cancer for high-cost, hospital-intensive and innovative treatments
data.notes: Oncology Benefit covers first R400,000 of treatment costs. PMB treatment covered above R400,000. 12-month cycle.
